SELECT A.ACDM_ID ,(SELECT ACDM_NM FROM TO_ACDM_BASE WHERE ACDM_ID = A.ACDM_ID) AS ACDM_NM ,A.LCTR_ID ,(SELECT LCTR_NM FROM TO_LCTR_BASE WHERE LCTR_ID = A.LCTR_ID) AS LCTR_NM ,A.COUS_NO ,A.COUS_NM ,A.COUS_DESC ,A.COUS_STRT_DT ,A.COUS_END_DT ,A.STRT_TM ,A.END_TM ,A.STDT_LFEE FROM TS_COUS_BASE A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.COUS_STAT_CD = '10' ORDER BY A.COUS_STRT_DT DESC, A.ACDM_ID
LIMIT ${rowCount} OFFSET ${currentIndex}
